name: Extreme Reality
tag_list: motion-control, gestures, gesture-control, skeleton, gaming, motion-games, 3d
overview:
XTR3D develops software that lets users interact with computers and gaming consoles using 3D human motions. Their real-time software analyzes 3D human motions using only one simple web cam. It will allow users to play games and interact in virtual worlds using natural human motions instead of keyboards, mouses and joysticks.

They refer to their technology as a “3D Human Machine Interface.” Currently, XTR3D’s software also runs on mobile devices and may be ported to any embedded platform.
